patthana9.16:1.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṃ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasaraṇaṃ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana9.16:2.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana9.16:3.1: Nasaraṇaṃ navipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana9.16:5.1: Nasaraṇaṃ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve.
patthana9.16:6.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana9.16:7.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naanupādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sabbattha ekaṃ.)
patthana9.16:8.1: Nasaraṇaṃ naanupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.
